Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Starting with the beginning: OR (Order Received) is always the first activity in every case. So OR must be the initial node with no predecessors. Then comes MS (Material Sourcing), QS (Quality Screening), AS (Assembly). These seem to follow in sequence: OR  MS  QS  AS. All cases start with this sequence, so thats a strict order.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Next after AS is IQC (In-line Quality Check). Looking at the logs, IQC is repeated multiple times in some cases (like Case 3 and 5).

Name: Hypothesis Generation - IND
Text: That suggests a loop where IQC and AS are repeated. ... So perhaps the loop is * (IQC, AS).

Name: Validation - NE
Text: But looking at Case 3: after the initial AS, the sequence is IQC, IQC, AS, IQC, AS, TST. ... This doesnt fit the loop structure.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: In Case 2, after AS, they go directly to TST without any IQC. So the choice after AS is either TST or enter the IQC loop.

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: This is getting complicated. Maybe the loop is structured as * (IQC, AS), and the execution can be: IQC  exit (no B), leading to TST. Or IQC  AS  IQC  exit.

Name: Abductive Reasoning - IND
Text: So the general structure is: AS  (IQC+ AS)*  TST.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: So after AS: AS  * (SEQ( * (IQC, skip), AS ), skip )  TST.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: In Case 1: ... Which matches. In Case 3: ... Which matches Case 3s log.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: After TST, theres a possibility of RT (re-testing), which loops back to TST. ... This can be modeled as a loop * (TST, RT).

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: LB is sometimes skipped (Case 2). So after PK, theres a choice between LB and skipping it.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: The overall structure is: OR  MS  QS  AS  X (TST, outer_loop)  * (TST, RT)  PK  X (LB, skip)  DP  D.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: The overall control flow is managed by a StrictPartialOrder that sequences these components: Initial Sequence  Choice After AS  TST Loop  PK  Labeling Choice  DP  D.
